alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Franklin; Hocking; Licking; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 5:14PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN FRANKLIN, FAIRFIELD, NORTHERN HOCKING, NORTHEASTERN PICKAWAY AND LICKING COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EST... At 514 PM EST, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Johnstown to Ashville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Newark, Lancaster, Reynoldsburg, Gahanna, Pickerington, Circleville, Heath, Logan, Granville, Pataskala, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Johnstown, Ashville, Baltimore, Buckeye Lake, Hebron, Utica and South Bloomfield. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 108 and 142, and near mile marker 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
